name: Quick! Monsters are coming!
description:
Infinite runner based on memories of playing frogger.

In a bucolic landscape, frogs croak and birds swoop overhead. But infernal monsters are approaching. Move up the screen as far as you can, avoiding traffic, drowning and the pursuing horde.

Ducking behind the monsters is possible... but carries its own dangers...

Xbox controller, or keyboard controls (redefinable in options screen): arrow keys to move, 'p' to pause.  Return selects, escape quits.

Windows version should run on most hardware/specs, but please let me know if you encounter any bugs/slowdown. I've only been able to test the Linux version on a virtual machine, where it was almost unplayably slow, but you may have better luck (please let me know if that's the case!). 

Feedback/comments welcome.

Twitter: @SunTrogGames
